Html:
Hi!!, I was wonderig if this code can create new mime messages (with attachments, html body ...) I don't see documentation or any posts/examples on how to do this.

Thank you

Regards

Leo

no. I haven't looked into this project for quite a while, but as far
as I remember the Microsoft SmtpClient class can do this already, so
incorporating this into my parser didn't seem like well spent time :)
